verses.verse: Meanwhile, when the tens of thousands of the crowd came together in one place in such a way to be traipsing on each other, He first began to be saying to His students, "Be cautious yourselves of the yeast of the Separatists, something that is faked behavior.
There is nothing that has been covered up well that will not be uncovered, and hidden that will not be known,
for the times that as much as you said in the dark will be heard in the light and what you spoke to the ear in the storage rooms will be spoken publicly on the housetops.
But I tell you, my friends, do not be afraid from the people who kill the body and after these things have nothing much more to do.
But I will put in front of your face who you should fear. Fear the One who, after the time for Him to kill, has authority to throw into the Hinnom Valley. Yes, I tell you, fear this One.
Are not five little sparrows sold for two assarii ($4)? And there is not one of them that has been forgotten in the sight of God.
But even all the hairs of your head have been numbered. So do not be afraid, you are more substantial than many little sparrows.
I tell you, everyone, whoever acknowledged being in Me in front of the people, the Son of the Person will also acknowledge being in him in front of the angels of God.
But the person who denied Me in the sight of the people will be flatly denied in the sight of the angels of God.

And everyone who will state a word in reference to the Son of the Person will be forgiven, but to him, to the person who says a hurtful thing in reference to the Sacred Spirit, it will not be forgiven.
When they bring you forward before the synagogues, the head rulers, and the authorities, do not worry how or what you will defend or what you will say.
You see, the Sacred Spirit will teach you in the same hour things that it is necessary to say."
Someone from the crowd said to Him, "Teacher, tell my brother to divide the inheritance with me."
But Jesus said to him, "Sir, who put Me in charge as an arbitrator or distributor over you?"
He said to them, "Look, and guard yourselves from the desire for more, because during the time for things to be overflowing to someone, his life is not from the things that are his."
He told an illustration to them, saying, "The rural area of a certain rich person was productive.
And He was thoroughly considering in himself, saying, 'What will I do because I do not have a place where I will gather my fruits?'
And he said, 'I will do this, I will take down my grain bins and build bigger. And I will gather everything there, my produce and my goods.
And I will state to my soul, "Soul, you have many goods lying here for many years. Relax. Eat. Drink. Celebrate."'
But God said to him, 'Distracted person, this night they are asking for your soul back from you. With whom will the things be that you got ready?'
This is how it is with the person saving up for himself and not being rich to God."
He said to His students, "Because of this, I tell you, don't worry about your soul (what you might eat), nor about the body (what you might put on).
The soul is more than the meal, and the body more than the apparel.

Take a closer look at the crows because they do not seed, nor harvest (with whom there is no storage room, nor grain bin), and God nurtures them. How much more substantial you are than the winged birds.
Who from among you by worrying is able to add on to his size one cubit (an elbow to fingertip length)?
So if you are not even capable of the smallest thing, why do you worry about the rest?
Take a closer look at the wild flowers, how a wild flower grows. It does not labor, nor spin yarn. But, I tell you, not even Solomon in all his magnificence put robes around himself as one of these.
If God dresses the grass this way, that is in the field today and tomorrow is thrown into an earthen furnace, how much more will He do for you, seldom trusting people?
And you must not look for what you might eat or what you might drink. And don't be anxious.
You see, the nations of the world look for all these, but your Father realizes that you need these.
More importantly, look for the empire of God, and all these things will be added to you.
Do not be afraid, the little flock, because it seemed like a good idea to your Father to give you the empire.

Sell the things that are yours and give a charitable donation. Make money bags for yourself that do not wear out, treasure unceasing in the heavens, where a thief doesn't come near, neither does a moth devour.
You see, where your treasure is, there your heart will also be.
Your waists must be waists around which a waist sash has been put, the lamps burning,
and you, like people awaiting their master when he will be released from the wedding events, so that when he comes and knocks, right away they might open the door to him.

Those slaves whom the master will find staying awake when he comes are blessed. Amen, I tell you that he will put a waist sash around himself, recline them, and, after coming alongside, will serve them.
And if he comes in the second guard shift (9:00 p. m. — midnight) and in the third guard shift of the night (midnight — 3:00 a. m.), he comes and finds them like this, those slaves are blessed.
Know this, that if the homeowner realized at which hour the thief comes, he would have stayed awake and not left his house to be broken into.
So you also must become ready, because the Son of the Person comes at an hour that it doesn't seem to you He will."
Peter said to Him, "Master, are you telling this illustration to us or also to everyone?"
The Master said, "Who is the trusted and focused manager, then? One whom the Master will put in charge over his attendants for the purpose to be giving the grain portion at the right time.
That slave is blessed whom, when his master comes, he will find doing so.
I truly tell you that he will put him in charge over all the things that are his.

But if that slave says in his heart, 'My master is taking a long time to come,' and begins to be hitting the servant boys and the servant girls, to be eating and to be drinking, and to be getting drunk,
the master of that slave will arrive during a day that he is not expecting and in an hour that he does not know. And he will cut him in two, and place his part with the people who cannot be trusted.
That slave, the one who knew what his own master wanted and did not get it ready (or do close to what he wanted), will be beaten many times.

But the one who did not know but did things deserving of wounds will be beaten a few times. To everyone whom much was given, much will be looked for from the side of him. And beside whom they placed much, they will ask him for much more.
I came to throw fire into the earth, and what do I want? If only it was already started.
I have a submersion to be submerged in, and how I am constrained by it until the time that it will be finished.
Does it seem to you that I showed up to give peace in the earth? Definitely not, I tell you, but instead thorough division.
You see, from the present on, there will be five that have been thoroughly divided in one house, three on two and two on three.

A father will be thoroughly divided on a son and a son on a father, a mother on a daughter and a daughter on a mother, a mother-in-law on her daughter-in-law and a daughter-in-law on her mother-in-law."
He also was saying to the crowds, "When you see the cloud ascending out of western regions, right away you say, 'Severe weather is coming,' and that is what happens.
And when a south wind is blowing, you say, 'It will be a hot wind,' and it happens.
Fakers, you know to be examining the appearance of the earth and the sky, but how are you not examining this appointed time?
Why don't you also out from yourselves judge the right thing?

You see, as you go back with your opponent in the court case before a head person, on the way, give work to have been relieved from him so that he might not drag you down to the judge, the judge might turn you over to the bailiff, and the bailiff may throw you into jail.
I tell you, you will not in any way come out from there until the time that you will give even the last tiny coin back."
